oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Large One Time Collections Expenditures
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: University of Alberta Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Contains a data file and a data dictionary which outlines the expenditures for large one time purchases in fiscal years 2014 through 2021 (April-March) at the University of Alberta Libraries.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Other
